description.narrative: Benin - Access To Financial Services Project: this project aimed to improve the efficiency of financial institutions and micro, small and medium enterprises by increasing access to financial services and improving productivity; strengthened supervision aimed to increase the microfinance institutions' self-sufficiency, decrease portfolios at risk, and increase loans guaranteed with land titles.
